job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T16:55:33.000Z", "description": "

We\u2019re looking for a Senior Site Reliability Engineer to join our tight infrastructure

team that gets to architect, build, and operate modern cloud-native AWS

environments and host enterprise-grade SaaS products. We use cutting edge

tooling and cloud solutions to create innovative, resilient, observable, and secure

solutions. We use Infrastructure as Code to define resources and configurations,

machine images to deploy idempotent VMs, and build Jenkins pipelines to

automate blue/green and canary deployments of applications. We\u2019ve embraced

working remotely and look forward to you joining the team.


Who We Are

AbsenceSoft is a rapidly growing Leave Management software company looking to hire

amazing people like you! We are a radically innovative provider of SaaS solutions for

FMLA, Disability, ADA, and other types of absences. We pride ourselves in having

created the most easily used, installed, and understood absence management system

and Human Resources Software. We value creative, innovative people who are

passionate about their work and who always believe there is always a better way.


Leading With Our Core Values (THRIVE)

\u2022 Team - We are a team. We show up for each other, act with empathy, listen well, have

fun, collaborate, and bring our authentic selves to work every day.

\u2022 Honesty - We are honest, trustworthy, and transparent with each other and our clients.

We act with integrity, ask the tough questions, and are open to honest feedback.

\u2022 Results - We are results-driven and act with urgency, accountability, and commitment.

We strive for continuous improvement and operational efficiency.

\u2022 Inspiring - We inspire and challenge each other every day. We bring a positive, can-do

attitude to the team and lift everyone up around us.

\u2022 Value - We provide tremendous value to our customers, employees, and shareholders,

which drives everything we do and guides our decision making.

\u2022 Entrepreneurial - We are willing to try new things and take risks, without fear of

failure. We continuously learn and improve in a fast-paced environment.


What You\u2019ll Do

\u2022 Create and maintain well-architected, idempotent AWS environments

\u2022 Define infrastructure in Terraform

\u2022 Create ansible playbooks to build fully baked AMIs

\u2022 Build Jenkins jobs to deploy infrastructure and applications

\u2022 Build and maintain data streaming and lambda functions for automation and

monitoring

\u2022 Architect security and reliability solutions

\u2022 Manage and monitor centralized monitoring and logging

\u2022 Build an observability architecture with APM and SIEM

\u2022 Troubleshoot and resolve performance and capacity hotspots in the platform

\u2022 Create infrastructure self-service tooling to empower development and support

teams


What\u2019ll Set You Up for Success

\u2022 Bachelor\u2019s degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

\u2022 3+ year SaaS / commercial for Market software experience

\u2022 3+ years plus Cloud Operations/DevOps experience on AWS

\u2022 Experience with CI/CD preferably with Jenkins

\u2022 Experience with Puppet or Ansible on Linux and/or Windows

\u2022 Experience Networking and DNS experience

\u2022 Experience managing microservice architectures a plus

\u2022 Experience with AWS serverless products a plus

\u2022 Entrepreneurial in thinking, outlook, and creative problem-solving


What To Know Before You Apply

\u2022 We\u2019re located in beautiful Golden, Colorado.

\u2022 This is a full-time, salaried position.

\u2022 AbsenceSoft provides a wide variety of perks and benefits. Including full medical,

dental, vision, 401K, and life insurance. Our brand new state of the art office has

automatic standing desks and a brand new oversized kitchen complete with

unlimited snacks and drinks. We support your professional growth including

industry training and CLMS Certification; opportunities for additional industry and

technology certifications, and continuing education.

\u2022 The salary range for this position is between $90,000 - $150,000.
